akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title XII, § 1205(c), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 716

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1475. Repealed. Pub. L. 97–35, title XII, § 1205(c), Aug. 13, 1981, 95 Stat. 716
Section, Pub. L. 91–601, § 6, Dec. 30, 1970, 84 Stat. 1672, provided for appointment of a technical advisory committee to assist the Secretary in carrying out the purposes of the Poison Prevention Packaging Act of 1970.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Aug. 13, 1981, see section 1215 of Pub. L. 97–35, set out as an Effective Date of 1981 Amendment note under section 2052 of this title.
